documentation.content:
## Create Utilization Metric (Metrics)

```declarative
metrics:
  create_gauge("pod.cpu.utilized", read_gauge("pod.cpu.usage") / read_gauge("node.cpu.limit"))
```

## Use Connector in Trace and Metrics Pipelines (YAML)

```yaml
receivers:
  foo:
exporters:
  bar:
connectors:
  count:
service:
  pipelines:
    traces:
      receivers: [foo]
      exporters: [count]
    metrics:
      receivers: [count]
      exporters: [bar]

```

## Multiple Go Generate Directives for mdatagen

```go
//go:generate mdatagen metadata.yaml
//go:generate mdatagen custom.yaml

package main
```
